value.title: Power BI Week Number (Weeknum) in Date Table #Q&A
value.excerpt: Week Numbers (Weeknum) in Power BI Date Table (Calendar Table) are extremely useful. Watch video to learn more and Download the Power BI file in Video at https://www.learnpowerbi.com/download   Week Numbers can allow you to show your data • Week over Week • Weekly Averages • Rolling Week Period …and

value.title: Top 5 Power BI Beginner Mistakes...⚠️You Don't Want to Make!⚠️
value.excerpt: I will share the Top 5 Power BI Beginner Mistakes that I wish I hadn't made when I started out with Power BI. ❌ Not Focusing on the Relationship ❌ Using the Same Old Names ❌ Mind Your Table Manners ✅ Pro Move: Measure Folders ❌ Not Managing by Exception ------------------------------------------------------------------------

value.title: What is Power BI Gateway? Do You Need it to Connect to On-Premise Data? Can You Avoid Using One?
value.excerpt: Power BI Gateway acts as a bridge to let PowerBI.com (Cloud) connect to your On-Premise (Local) Data Sources – like local Excel Files or a local SQL Server.   Watch our complete video series on Power BI Gateways: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7GQQXV5Z8edw57_eLqD9By5mzxIqxSJ1 1. What is a Power
